metadata.inclusion:
1. Touch any key on the device.
2. The device will flash LEDs yellow three times and switch on all outputs if inclusion succeeds.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Press and hold the top left button for at least 8 seconds.
2. LED will flash red three times and sound a tone to confirm exclusion.
metadata.reset:
1. Remove the unit from the wall mounting box.
2. Press and hold the hidden Factory Reset button for at least 3 seconds.
3. LED will flash red three times and sound a tone to confirm factory reset.
